bibl.title: The Nuptial Rite in Catullus 66 and Callimachus' Poetry for Berenice.
bibl.note: Concerns the absence from P. Oxy. XX, 2258 C fr. 1-2 (= Pack2 186) of any counterpart to the lines of Catullus. Develops a less favoured alternative to the two solutions which have attracted most support.
HOLLIS A.S., The Nuptial Rite in Catullus 66 and Callimachus' Poetry for Berenice.
